name: Piano Tile Tapper: Arcade Music Game
name_original: Piano Tile Tapper: Arcade Music Game
description:
Play the piano in a new way with Piano Tile Tapper! Best arcade music game! Turn on that tune, follow the rythm with this one-tep arcade game! 

Special Features
 Multiplayer! - show your music skills
 Challenge Friends - share your score online!
 Achievements - unlock new levels
 Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

The concert is starting! Come and show us how you can make the best out of every tune! Piano Tile Tapper is completely free!

WHAT'S NEW
Hello musicians, singers and composers! And gamers! Ready for the big piece? A lot of new features just for you:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
